H0.text: The word husband is derived from the ancient Old Norse meanings of 'house' and what activity. Hunt

H1.text: The word husband is derived from the ancient Old Norse meanings of 'house' and what activity. Trade

H2.text: The word husband is derived from the ancient Old Norse meanings of 'house' and what activity. Craft

H3.text: The word husband is derived from the ancient Old Norse meanings of 'house' and what activity. Farm

A4.text: Old Norse hūsbōndi (hūs, 'house' + bōndi, būandi, present participle of būa, 'to dwell', so, etymologically, 'a householder').

A5.text: the ownership and care of a household or farm
